title.narrative: Supporting Ethiopian Female Entrepreneurs in establishing trade relations with Danish partners

description.narrative: Ethiopian Female Entrepreneurs establish trade relations with the Danish market

title.narrative: Number of female entrepreneurs who establish trade relations with the Danish market

Number of female entrepreneurs who establish trade relations with the Danish market The development aspiration of hte project to establish business relations between Danish and Ethiopian companies has not been achieved to any significant extent. the initial market assessment already. some contacts have been made to micro-roasteries by the cofee companies and to a limited number of buyers by the leather companies, but whether this will develop in to serious business relations is difficult to say and would in all cases require a close and consistent follow up by the EThiopian companies. A year after the completion of the project its impact will be assessed by the Embassy together with CAWEE.
